description:
This Course is not sponsored by or affiliated with Udemy, Inc.

__________________________________________________

Udemy Success 2: Create a Udemy Course in 7 Days with EASE! Learn from someone who had created 40 Udemy courses in the past year.


Rosa's Online School:

  • Teaching 8 Courses on Kindle & Udemy Successes!
  • Teaching 32 Courses on Music & Piano Courses!

OVER 15,000 Successful students have already taken my online courses since July 2014 with 382 - 5 Star Reviews

Course Updated: January 1, 2016

++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Review By Denise Fletcher

Great Instructor

Rose is a great personable instructor and this course is full of great tips to get anyone motivated to get going on creating your first course or another course.

___________________________________________________________________

Udemy Success 2 - Learn Quick Tips from a Udemy Instructor (Teaching 28 Udemy Courses) to Get a Quality Udemy Course Up in 7 Days with EASE!

Who is this course for?

1. This Course is PERFECT for Udemy Starters! You are going to fast track your course creation from all my 12 months of trials and errors in course creation. You will cruise along much faster from my failures and successes. Know how to streamline the entire process of Course Creation!

2. The Course is PERFECT for Udemy Instructors who are frustrated and discouraged in the course creation process. This course will help TAP into the power of keeping you FOCUSED and feeling ACCOMPLISHED right to the end.

Are you having a hard time getting up a Udemy course? You almost want to give up. You are not earning from all the hard work you put into preparing the courses. Many things are calling your attention, and you do not know where to focus. Publishing a course seems too difficult and too much work!

Well I have good news for you. I have published 28 courses at Udemy in the past year. You ask, "How do you do that?" And they are not short courses with just 5 sections & 10 lectures. They are medium sized high quality Udemy courses that students keep buying and buying!

Here's the Secret: Having created 28 courses, I understanding the complexity of creating a Udemy course with high quality. In this course, I break the entire process up into manageable and actionable steps. Step 8 in the course is my turning point to getting fully organized with highly productivity. This leads to getting my video lectures recorded quickly one after another. Step 9 helps you to see everyone at one glance that yes, you can do it! You need to be able to visualize the final product in your heart and mind! This is one of the top secret of beating procrastination and overcoming initial course creation blockages & struggles. From there on, your productivity from Day 3 cruises on. Keep yourself fully organized is the KEY. "Less is More"!

Maybe you have been having a hard time waiting around to get your courses approved by the Review team. There is always something lacking and missing in your production, and therefore the entire process of getting approval by the Review Team is delayed. I lay out all the steps you need to take so that you can get your course approved right away after submission.

Here's another Secret: Make sure you set up your profile setting correctly. Get organized. I have prepared actions steps for you to take so that you can become highly productive & move from one step to another in these coming 7 days.

Get to work and get your first Udemy course up by next week. Once you know what you want to teach, you have a skill to share with others, you just need to quickly set up a good efficient working station for yourself & follow my 7 Day Plan.

You will learn from my course that successful Udemy Instructors teach multiple courses. From the "One vs Many" Section, you will realize how your Revenue Income multiplies with multiple courses. You don't need to keep creating courses every week to be successful. Even a course a month will lead you onto the path of success.

Follow me to create high quality Udemy courses that get accepted in the Udemy platform:

  • 25 Steps - A successful journey is paved with moving forward steps!
  • 5 Steps only takes 1 minute work, but they are crucial steps to your success
  • 5 Success Tips to Powerful Udemy Course Creation
  • 5 Final Smart Tips in Final Completion - Very IMPORTANT for SEO purposes

*******************************************************************

This Course teaches you how to quickly plan & publish a Udemy course within 7 Days. The guidelines will help you overcome course creation blockages so that you can start building a career at Udemy. Eventually, as you see how easy it is to create courses at the Udemy platform, you will be able to create a handful of courses in the coming months.

Successful Udemy Instructors teach multiple courses. From the "One vs Many" Section, you will realize how your Revenue Income multiplies with multiple courses. You will be highly motivated to get going to create more courses in the coming days. You don't need to keep creating courses every week to be successful. Even a course a month will lead you onto the path of Udemy Success. This is just the beginning. As you grow and learn to 'brand' yourself and your courses in Udemy Success 3, you cannnot but succeed.

*********************************************

Here is what you will learn in this course. This course specifically focuses on the Udemy platform so that you can quickly have your course approved by the Udemy Review team.

Introduction

Turn Defeat Into Victory

Conclusion

I have invited 2 Guest Speakers into this course. Guess who they are?

Come on in and enroll into this class and I will see you inside,

Rosa


***************************************************************************

  • Over 15,000 very happy students already in my Udemy classes
  • See the 5 Star Reviews from VERY satisfied students

title: Udemy #2 - Secrets in Fast Course Creation - Unofficial
